backup.beta-backup: Beta feature - do a personal backup too
backup.camera-access-information: To create a social backup, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to record a verification video
backup.complete-backup-save-file-help: For example, an encrypted drive, USB stick, or secure cloud storage. Avoid sharing it in public or untrusted apps.
backup.choose-method-instructions: Backing up your wallet will help you recover your money if you ever lose access to Fedi
backup.cloud-backup-instructions: Create a backup of your recovery file in your cloud storage. You will also be required to backup this file with two friends or family.
backup.creating-recovery-file: Encrypting your video into a secure Fedi backup file. Only you and your guardians can access it during recovery.
backup.hold-record-button: Hold the record button and say:
backup.personal-backup-description: Backup now so you can restore access to your money, chats, and important data if your device is lost, replaced, or the app is reinstalled.
backup.personal-backup-warning-line-1: Only you have access to your backup.
backup.personal-backup-warning-line-2: We can't recover it for you.
backup.personal-backup-words-tip: Write these 12 words in a safe place.
backup.personal-backup-instructions: Write down 12 recovery words. This is for experienced members.
backup.please-review-backup-video: Please confirm that video is clear
backup.press-record-button: Press the record button and say:
backup.record-error: Encountered an error using your camera
backup.recovery-words-instructions: Write these words down with pen and paper. Do not save these words digitally on your device.
backup.review-face-confirmation: I confirm my face can be clearly seen in this video
backup.review-voice-confirmation: I confirm my voice can be clearly heard in this video
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-where: We recommend saving your file in different places (messaging apps, email, cloud storage, etc.)
backup.social-backup-instructions: Record a video to prove your identity. This option is best if you know your guardians well.
backup.social-backup-warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Use this feature only if you personally know your guardians.
backup.start-social-backup-desc: Record a short video so your guardians can help you recover your account if needed. They'll only see it when you ask.
backup.start-social-backup-warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Use this feature only if you personally know your guardians.
backup.start-social-backup-permissions-text: Access to your camera and microphone is required to record a social backup video.
backup.record-video-tip: Make sure your face is clearly visible and well lit.
backup.confirm-video-text: Check that your face and voice are clear in the video. This helps your guardians confirm it's really you.
backup.start-personal-backup-instructions: Get a pen and paper and write down the recovery words on the next screen.
backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Your video will be converted to a private wallet backup file. Guardians can only view it when you request to recover your wallet.
backup.successfully-backed-up: You successfully backed up your Fedi wallet
backup.video-file-too-large: Video file too large, please record a shorter one

chat.create-or-join-public-chat: Create or join a public group chat in the Fedi app ‚Äî for announcements or open discussions. It will show up here so you can add it to your community.
chat.first-entry-option-1: Federation & Community news, group chats, and private messages.
chat.first-entry-option-2: Send and receive money right in the chat.

chat.multispend-preview: This group has new multispend activity

chat.need-registration-description: Set your display name to be able to send and receive with other users.
chat.no-messages: No messages in this group yet.

chat.offline-reply-error-1: Please wait for the message to send before replying to it

chat.public-group-notice: This is a public group. Members and messages are publicly viewable.

chat.search-chats-list-guidance: Search usernames from direct messages & group names from group chats.

onboarding.agree-terms-privacy:
By continuing, you agree to our
<termsLink>Terms of Use</termsLink> & <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

onboarding.by-clicking-you-agree-user-agreement:
By continuing, you agree to our

onboarding.create-info-1: A Federation is managed by trusted people called guardians.
onboarding.create-info-2: Guardians work together to keep the Federation safe and secure.
onboarding.create-info-3: This teamwork protects your wallet, privacy, and keeps your Federation strong.
onboarding.create-info-4: You can create a Federation that‚Äôs either public (open to anyone) or private (invite-only).
onboarding.create-info-5: Fedi's G-Bot service makes it easy to create your own Federation using Chat.
onboarding.description: Federations are the homes for your personal wallets. Get started with open federations.
onboarding.description-create: Start your own Federation simply and fast. Fees apply.
onboarding.description-create-community: Start a place for connection, conversation, and shared services.
onboarding.description-join: Scan or paste the invite code to unlock access to a private or public federation.
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Now you will be able to send money, communicate with your community, and more with Fedi.
onboarding.guidance-1: A Federation is managed by trusted people called guardians.
onboarding.guidance-2: Guardians work together to keep the Federation safe and secure.
onboarding.guidance-3: This teamwork protects your wallet, privacy, and keeps your community strong.
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Try a federation from the Awesome Fedimint list
onboarding.heading: Join or Create a Federation
onboarding.network-error: Please ensure you are online to continue
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Sorry, this federation is not accepting new users
onboarding.one-time-modal-option-1: Top up your wallet to send, receive, and save money.
onboarding.one-time-modal-option-2: Join more federations and secure your money in different personal wallets.
onboarding.tagline:
Chat, money and mini apps.
Empowered by community.
onboarding.terms-url: By clicking 'I accept' you agree to the terms of service at <url />
onboarding.title: Wallets need Federations
onboarding.unsupported-notice: This federation is no longer supported. It cannot be joined.
onboarding.username-instructions: Your username will be how other members will identify you.
onboarding.web-link-page-description: You're opening a Fedi link. Choose how you'd like to continue.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: As a new member of the federation, you will receive a fresh wallet.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: As a returning member of the federation, your wallet will be restored. This may take a few minutes.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: New members receive a fresh wallet. Returning members will have their old wallet recovered automatically.

parser.unsupported-bolt11-zero-amount: Zero amount Lightning invoices are not supported. Generate a new invoice with an amount and try again.

permissions.allow-camera-description: Scan QR codes, chat usernames, send money, and more
permissions.allow-notifications-description: New chat messages, payments, and announcements
permissions.allow-storage-description: Upload files, set your profile picture, and more

pin.backup-notice: If you forget your PIN, your backup is the only way to recover access to your money and chats.
pin.recovery-notice: If you forgot your PIN, you can get access to Fedi with your backup and create a new PIN.

popup.ending-description: This temporary federation <bold>will end {{date}}</bold>. The remaining funds will be managed at the discretion of the guardians.

quick-fact.fact-1: You can join as many Federations as you'd like. Each Federation gives you a new separate wallet.
quick-fact.title: Quick Fact

receive.balance-not-spendable-offline: This balance will not be able to be spent until you come back online
receive.claim-ecash-online: Come back online to claim it
receive.lnurl-receive-notice-2: Ideal for shops, creators, or community contributors. Just share once and get paid repeatedly.
receive.no-incoming-funds-detected: No incoming funds detected. Please try again later.
receive.onchain-expert-only: For your safety: Keep the transaction size under 40 kB and DO NOT reuse this address in the future. This will help prevent any potential issues with your deposit.
receive.onchain-funds-received: Funds have been received! Transaction updated.
receive.receive-guidance-subtitle-1: Funds may take several hours to arrive.
receive.receive-guidance-subtitle-2: Use a new one each time.

recovery.camera-access-information: To assist with recovery, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan the social recovery code
recovery.cancel-social-recovery-detail: Would you like to cancel social recovery?
recovery.choose-method-instructions: Select how you want to recover your account:
recovery.complete-social-recovery-description: Share this code with your guardians so they can confirm your identity.
recovery.continue-recovery-description: Recovery will take a little longer than we expected. Thank you for your patience.
recovery.create-new-wallet-guidance: This wallet will only be accessible on this device, unless you recover & transfer to another device
recovery.device-migration-detected:
New phone?
 Let's get you set up!
recovery.from-different-device: From a different device to this one
recovery.guardian-approval-instructions: Guardians need to confirm you are the person in your Fedi Intro Video to recover your money
recovery.guardian-qr-instructions: Guardians will need to scan this QR code to begin the social recovery process
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions: Find the file you saved when creating your Social Backup. For example, it might be in an encrypted drive, USB stick, or secure cloud storage.
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-1: You may have shared this file with friends or stored it in a few different places:
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-3: The Fedi File name looks like:
recovery.locked-device-guidance-1: The wallet on this device has been transferred to another device.
recovery.locked-device-guidance-3: If you want to set up another wallet on this device, please delete and reinstall Fedi. üëç
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-1: Fedi can only be used on one phone at a time. To move your money, chats, and important data here safely:
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-3: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Remove Fedi from this phone and reinstall it
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-4: ‚ö†Ô∏è Backup first to avoid losing access to your money!
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-2:
Now, remove Fedi from this phone and reinstall the app.

 Remember to use the words you saved to recover your money, chats, and important data.
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-3: If you need any help, <anchor>click here</anchor> to contact our support team
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Backup file {{fileName}} failed to open. Please try and recover from another one of your shared locations.
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Enter the 12 words you wrote down when you first backed up your wallet
recovery.personal-recovery-method: If you saved your 12 recovery words, enter them to restore your account.
recovery.recovery-assist-title: Help a user recover their account
recovery.recovery-assist-subtitle: Follow these steps to confirm the member's identity and approve their recovery request.
recovery.recovery-assist-step-1: Scan or paste the user's recovery code.
recovery.recovery-assist-step-3: Confirm it's the same person you know.
recovery.recovery-assist-step-4: Approve or reject the recovery request.
recovery.recovery-assist-description: A member of your Federation is requesting your assistance in recovering their wallet
recovery.recovery-assist-federation-not-found: You need to join the Federation first.
recovery.recovery-assist-scan-subtitle: Scan or paste the user's recovery code to view their backup video.
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-question: Is the person in this video the same member requesting recovery?
recovery.recovery-assist-hold-to-confirm: Press and hold to confirm your choice
recovery.recovery-assist-error-message: Request could not be completed. Please try again.
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Thank you for helping recover money for a Federation member
recovery.recovery-assist-confirmation-success: Your confirmation supports the recovery. Other guardians still need to review.
recovery.recovery-assist-confirmation-error: Your response helps protect the account. The member can recover only if three guardians confirm.
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Watch video to confirm member identity.
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: Does this video show the same member trying to do social recovery now?
recovery.recovery-in-progress-balance: Recovery is in progress. Your balances will be available soon.
recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Recovery is in progress. Chat payments will be available soon.
recovery.recovery-in-progress-payments: Recovery is in progress. Payments will be available soon.
recovery.select-a-device-guidance: Select a device to transfer an existing wallet from.
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Open your social recovery Fedi file that was created when you recorded your backup video. We prompted you to save the file and share it with friends.
recovery.social-recovery-method: If you recorded a video, ask your guardians to confirm your identity.
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Try to go back to the guardians and prove your identity
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-1: This will bring your existing wallet to this device and lock the wallet on the other device.
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-2: You do not need the old device to transfer.
recovery.wallet-moved-desc: It's now active on another device. To set up a new wallet here, reinstall Fedi.

send.cancel-notes-warning: Are you sure you want to cancel sending ecash?
send.ecash-recipient-notice: Recipient must come online to claim ecash. Cancel Send will prevent claiming ecash.
send.edit-notes-placeholder: Leave a note for this transaction.
send.offline-send-warning: On the next step, when the QR is presented, the sats will be removed from your wallet
send.transferred-description: will reach the recipient's Stable Balance wallet shortly.

settings.repair-wallet-description: Do not use this tool unless directed by the Fedi Council.
settings.repair-wallet-confirmation: Are you sure you want to repair your wallet? ONLY do this if directed by the Fedi Council.

stabilitypool.deposit-success-description: will reach your USD Stable Balance wallet shortly.
stabilitypool.deposits-disabled-by-federation: Stability Pool Deposits have been disabled by the Federation
stabilitypool.info-description: Put your Bitcoin here to hold its value in USD. When you move it back, you'll get that same USD amount, even if Bitcoin's price changed.
stabilitypool.no-bitcoin-notice: You must have bitcoin to deposit into {{currency}} balance
stabilitypool.pending-withdrawal-blocking: Please wait for pending withdrawals to process before making further deposits or withdrawals
stabilitypool.reusable-payment-code-guidance: Share it to receive USD Stable Balance from other Fedi users.

support.analytics-consent-description: Help us make Fedi better by sharing general app usage. No personal info. Opt out anytime.
support.effective-support-1a: By proceeding, you agree that Fedi may collect some
support.effective-support-1b: solely to provide you the best support possible.
support.effective-support-2a:
Prefer not to share? No problem! You
can always explore our
support.effective-support-2b: for a wealth of Fedi knowledge.
support.enter-ticket-number: Enter the ticket number given by our team.
support.how-to-launch: If you need help, you may launch the support chat by clicking the button below.
support.log-disclaimer: Do not use this form unless directed by the Fedi Council. Please first report any issues to us <anchor>here</anchor>.
support.title: Ask Fedi
support.zendesk-initialization-failed: We couldn't reach the support chat. Please check your internet connection and try again.

wallet.join-federation: Join a federation to activate your wallet
wallet.show-fiat-txn-amounts-info: Transaction amounts will be displayed in the selected fiat currency
